channel.title: Weird Cache Error
channel.description:
Hello moparscape. When i'm still busy with jarring my client my cache finally downloads after doing allot of changes and 2 onthers coders. but now this weird error showed up and since i'm a beginning coder i really don't know what i need to do with this.
if somebody can tell me where i need to look or what i need to do i can continue with my server.
the CMD when i start the client after is downloaded cache. [code]WBCache.zip 17749453 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\sercan\WBCache\data\1063.dat (Het systee m kan het opgegeven pad niet vinden) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open0(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:219) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:176) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:78) at client.startUp(client.java:7398) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4846) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Client screen just showing connection error retrying in (seconds)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LQJS2pP.png[/img]
and
[img]http://i.imgur.com/slrsbZn.png[/img]
you will see 1063.dat is there and only things i changed to the client are the Fkeys and the Background of the client.

item.title: Weird Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @runeball runeball
item.description:
@runeball wrote:

i zipped the cache like you need to zip as i know then later i even looked at tuts because i thought i did it wrong

soz for the late reaction i didn’t saw the post.
http://pastebin.com/FAUJyL0t

my cachedownloader

-EDIT Can somebody please help me with this i need it done

Read full topic

item.title: Weird Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Can I have a look at your cachedownloader class?

Also you did zip the cache correctly i’m guessing, correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Weird Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @runeball runeball
item.description:
@runeball wrote:

Hello moparscape. When i’m still busy with jarring my client my cache finally downloads after doing allot of changes and 2 onthers coders.
but now this weird error showed up and since i’m a beginning coder i really don’t know what i need to do with this.

if somebody can tell me where i need to look or what i need to do i can continue with my server.

the CMD when i start the client after is downloaded cache.

WBCache.zip 17749453 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\sercan\WBCache\data\1063.dat (Het systee m kan het opgegeven pad niet vinden) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open0(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:219) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:176) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:78) at client.startUp(client.java:7398) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4846) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

and
